item.title: Install rpm via Ansible
item.description: Manual 1sudo rpm -Uvh https://mirror.webtatic.com/yum/el7/webtatic-release.rpm In Ansible: 1- name: Add Web Static Repo 2yum: 3name: https://mirror.webtatic.com/yum/el7/webtatic-release.rpm 4state: present
